Message:
Almost 10 years have passed
since I began watching over
Illya from the shadows.

The idea of offering her
my guidance never once
crossed my mind.

But, the situation has changed
now that there are those trying
to control that girl’s will...

It goes without saying that
whatever Illya chooses will
greatly alter the fate of the world.

But, even so... No, perhaps
I should say because of that...
The choice should be
hers to make.

Precisely because people
decide their own fate,
their lives shine, and their journey
becomes an object of beauty.

If anyone dares to interfere with
that journey, I won’t let them,
even if they’re God Himself.

As that is what I believe to be...
my...true calling...
